channel.title: Comments on: Decisions for Heroes wins the IQPrize

item.title: By: Anthony Halpin
item.dc:creator: Anthony Halpin
item.description: "Incubation programmes like Genesis and Hothouse are critical here"<br><br>"Anyone could enter. Anyone"<br><br>I sense a little bit of a contradiction there!
item.content:encoded:
“Incubation programmes like Genesis and Hothouse are critical here”

“Anyone could enter. Anyone”

I sense a little bit of a contradiction there!
